data.title: the place to come for anything lamps
data.text: We weren't looking for lamps (our thing is collectibles) but if you need a lamp or anything related to a lamp this is a place you should check out.  I found it very tight and some areas cluttered but I did manage to find a small item I didn't even know I needed.  They have a beautiful and friendly gray kitty that ended up following me all around the store (I was told he wasn't for sale).  The man that owns the place was very nice and answered any question we had (especially about his kitty).  Look for the mural and park in that parking lot and walk to all the great antique stores.
